S063G.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE

S063G.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSION 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S063G.Q6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWE? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARM?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q9. IS YOUR WIFE NOW EXPECTING A BAB?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I'M NOT MARRIED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063G.Q10. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063G.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q12. HAS THE ARMY CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MA?  1. YES, THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 2. NO, THE ARMY HAS NOT CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q13. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CAMP WHERE YOU ARE NOW STATIONE?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q14. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. FINANCE 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q15. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. CAVALRY 15. FINANCE 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q16. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR THE TRAINING YOU ARE GETTING IN THE ARMY WILL OR WILL NOT HELP YOU TO GET A BETTER JOB THAN YOU HAD BEFORE YOU WENT INTO THE ARM?  1. WILL HELP ME TO GET A BETTER JOB 2. WILL NOT HELP ME TO GET A BETTER JOB 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q17. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063G.Q18. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JO?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q19. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q20. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063G.Q21. DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE GOOD IN THE ARM?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q22. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q23. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q24. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q25. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q26. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q27. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. SATISFIED 2. VERY SATISIFED 3. DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q28. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WHERE YOU BEST FI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q29. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063G.Q30. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED

S063G.Q31. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARM?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063G.Q32. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A SOLDIER AS MOST OF THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q33. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q34. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD LIKE TO COME BACK TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT FOR TWO WEEKS OF TRAINING EVERY YEA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q35. ON THE WHOLE, WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE WELL ADJUSTED OR POORLY ADJUSTED TO ARMY LIF?  1. I AM VERY WELL ADJUSTED 2. I AM FAIRLY WELL ADJUSTED 3. I AM NOT SO WELL ADJUSTED 4. I AM VERY POORLY ADJUSTED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q36. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD D?  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE O.K. 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN'T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 0. NO ANSWER X. CODES 1-4 PRECODED ON QUESTIONNAIRE, OTHER RESPONSES. VOLUNTEERED

S063G.Q37. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTIN?  1. I'M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 2. I'D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT'S OVER, BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 3. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I'LL DO ALL RIGHT 4. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I'LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 5. CHECKS NUMBER 1 BUT QUALIFIES BY ASKING FOR FURLOUGH 6. OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING NO WISH FOR COMBAT 7. ALL OTHER 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063G.Q38. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMAN?  01. LESS THAN ONE YEAR 02. ONE YEAR 03. OVER ONE YEAR LESS THAN TWO 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS LESS THAN THREE 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. SHORT TIME 09. LONG TIME 10. NO INDICATION OF TIME 11. DON'T KNOW 00. NO ANSWER

OVER TWO YEARS LESS THAN THREE 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. SHORT TIME 09. LONG TIME 10. NO INDICATION OF TIME 11. DON'T KNOW 00. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q42. HOW DO YOU THINK THIS WAR WILL COME OUT FOR THE ALLIE?  1. IT WILL BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY FOR US 2. WE WILL WIN, BUT IT WON'T BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY 3. IT WILL END IN A DRAW 4. THE OTHER SIDE HAS A PRETTY GOOD CHANCE OF WINNING 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS 2. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q50. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR REGIMEN? (IF YOU ARE NOT PART OF A REGIMENT ANSWER THIS QUESTION FOR THE LARGEST UNIT TO WHICH YOU BELONG.)  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q53. ABOUT HOW MANY TIMES IN THE PAST 30 DAYS HAVE YOU HAD LEAVE FROM CAMP FOR 12 HOURS OR MORE AT A TIM?  01. 1 TIME 02. 2 TIMES 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6 07. 7 08. 8 09. 9 10. 10 OR MORE TIMES 11. NONE 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063G.Q54. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN YOUR FAIR SHARE OF FURLOUGHS AND PASSE?  1. YES, I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF BOTH FURLOUGHS AND PASSES 2. I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF FURLOUGHS, BUT NOT OF PASSES 3. I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF PASSES, BUT NOT OF FURLOUGHS 4. NO, I HAVE NOT HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF EITHER FURLOUGHS OR PASSES 0. NO ANSWER

S063G.Q55. UP TO NOW, HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER, BUT NOT MUCH 3. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 4. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 5. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063G.Q56A. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR SOLDIERS IN YOUR OUTFIT WILL FIND IT EASIER OR HARDER TO GET JOBS THAN THEY DID BEFORE THE WA?  1. EASIER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. HARDER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 56B NOT CODED.

S063G.Q57A. DO YOU THINK THAT THINGS WILL BE BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOU PERSONALLY AFTER THE WAR THAN THEY WERE BEFORE THE WA?  1. BETTER FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME FOR ME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. WORSE FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 57B NOT CODED.

THEY ARE GETTING ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION NOW 3. THEY ARE GETTING TOO LITTLE ATTENTION NOW 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
